sentences.english: The foreign ministry refers not to the women, but to “the issue known as ‘wartime comfort women’”.
sentences.chinese: 日本外交部从不提及个别女性，只称“战时慰安妇”。

sentences.english: Dozens of Chinese women were forced to work as sex slaves there.
sentences.chinese: 数十中国妇女被迫成为慰安妇。

sentences.english: Tokyo set up a fund in 1995 to provide compensation to former sex slaves.
sentences.chinese: 日本曾在1995年建立了一个赔偿慰安妇的基金。

sentences.english: They were known as "comfort women" for soldiers in Japan's Imperial Army.
sentences.chinese: 她们被称为“慰安妇”，为日本皇军“服务”。

sentences.english: The U.S. House of Representatives adopted a similar motion on the sex slaves -- known euphemistically in Japan as "comfort women" -- in late July.
sentences.chinese: 在七月末，美国众议院也就慰安妇问题采取类似动议。
